mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SID, MESSAGEID, SENDER, ITEMID, FLAGED, IFREAD, CREATEDATE, RECEIVEDATE, SENDTONAME, PRODUCTID, STYPE, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPENAME, CATEGORYID, CATEGORYNAME, ORDERID, STATUS, FOLDERID, FOLDERNAME, OPER, OPERTIME, UPDATEFLAG, OPENFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, OPERTYPE, SUBJECT, CONTENT, DESCR, PRODUCTNAME, ANSWER from db_ebaymessagelog where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, SID, MESSAGEID, SENDER, ITEMID, FLAGED, IFREAD, CREATEDATE, RECEIVEDATE, SENDTONAME, PRODUCTID, STYPE, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPENAME, CATEGORYID, CATEGORYNAME, ORDERID, STATUS, FOLDERID, FOLDERNAME, OPER, OPERTIME, UPDATEFLAG, OPENFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, OPERTYPE, SUBJECT, CONTENT, DESCR, PRODUCTNAME, ANSWER from db_ebaymessagelog
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , SID , MESSAGEID , SENDER , ITEMID , FLAGED , IFREAD , CREATEDATE , RECEIVEDATE , SENDTONAME , PRODUCTID , STYPE , SHOPTYPEID , SHOPTYPENAME , CATEGORYID , CATEGORYNAME , ORDERID , STATUS , FOLDERID , FOLDERNAME , OPER , OPERTIME , UPDATEFLAG , OPENFLAG , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4 , OPERTYPE , SUBJECT , CONTENT , DESCR , PRODUCTNAME , ANSWER

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MESSAGEID = #{messageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SENDER = #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FLAGED = #{flaged,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
IFREAD = #{ifread,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
RECEIVEDATE = #{receivedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
SENDTONAME = #{sendtoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STYPE = #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPTYPEID = #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPTYPENAME = #{shoptypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CATEGORYID = #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CATEGORYNAME = #{categoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FOLDERID = #{folderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FOLDERNAME = #{foldername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
UPDATEFLAG = #{updateflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTYPE = #{opertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ANSWER = #{answer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
